scripts.setup:
rm -rf ./.dist && rm -rf ./node_modules && npm install && npm link && echo "

WARNING: Using local copy of ProductionLine. This should be moved into it's own npm package before final release.

" && npm link productionline && cd ./test && npm run setup && cd ../src && npm run setup && cd ../components && npm run setup && cd ../plugins && npm run setup
scripts.update:
npm update && npm link && echo "

WARNING: Using local copy of ProductionLine. This should be moved into it's own npm package before final release.

" && npm link productionline && cd ./test && npm update && cd ../src && npm update
